price: بيا به موږ هغه كسان وژغورو چې ځان ساتنه (تقوا) يې كوله او ظالمان به په ګونډو غورځېدلي پكې پرېږدو.
arabic: ثُمَّ نُنَجِّي ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَواْ وَّنَذَرُ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ فِيهَا جِثِيّٗا

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: thumma nunajjī alladhīna ittaqaw wanadharu al-ẓālimīna fīhā jithiyyan
